level.heading: Other remedies.
level.text: A protected individual who pursues remedies under this subchapter is not precluded from pursuing other legal or equitable remedies against the respondent.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-296
level.text: For Law 14-296, see notes following ยง 16-1041.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon ยง 7 of the Uniform Interstate Enforcement of Domestic Violence Protection Orders Act.
